details: The server has successfully processed the request.

message: The resource has been successfully created.
details: This status is returned when a new resource has been created successfully.

message: The request has been accepted for processing, but the processing has not been completed.
details: This status is typically used for asynchronous operations.

message: The server has successfully processed the request, but there is no content to return.
details: This status is used when the request was successful, but there is no need to return any data.

message: The request was malformed or contains invalid data.
details: This error occurs when the request cannot be processed due to invalid input or parameters.

message: Authentication is required and has failed or has not yet been provided.
details: This error occurs when the request lacks valid authentication credentials.

message: You do not have permission to access the requested resource.
details: This error occurs when the server understands the request but refuses to authorize it.

message: The requested resource could not be found.
details: This error occurs when the server cannot find the resource matching the request URL.

message: The HTTP method used is not supported for the requested resource.
details: This error occurs when the HTTP method (GET, POST, etc.) is not allowed for the resource.

message: The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the target resource.
details: This error occurs when attempting to insert duplicate data or update an existing resource in a conflicting way.

message: The request was well-formed, but the server was unable to process the contained instructions.
details: This error occurs when the server understands the request but cannot process it due to semantic errors (e.g., validation issues).

message: An unexpected error occurred on the server.
details: This error occurs when the server encounters an unexpected condition that prevents it from fulfilling the request.

message: The server does not support the functionality required to fulfill the request.
details: This error occurs when the server does not recognize the request method or functionality is not available.

message: The server received an invalid response from the upstream server.
details: This error occurs when a server acting as a gateway or proxy gets an invalid response from an upstream server.

message: The server is currently unable to handle the request due to temporary overload or maintenance.
details: This error occurs when the server is temporarily down or overloaded.

message: The server did not receive a timely response from the upstream server or some other auxiliary server.
details: This error occurs when the server, while acting as a gateway or proxy, did not get a response in time from the upstream server.

message: The server does not support the HTTP version that was used in the request.
details: This error occurs when the server does not support the HTTP version specified in the request.
